text: はい、できた / 簡単じゃん / どうしてこんな難しいのができて / 学校のテストがダメなの?
translation: There, done! / That's easy! / How can you solve such difficult problems / but fail school tests?
grammar: どうして...の? - 'why/how...?' question pattern; ~ができて - 'can do ~' (potential form with て-form connecting clauses)

text: 問題に何が書いてあるのか分かんなかったのよ / それって日本語の説問が読めなかったってこと? / そう、まだ漢字全部覚えてないのよね
translation: I didn't understand what was written in the questions. / You mean you couldn't read the Japanese questions? / Right, I still haven't memorized all the kanji yet.
grammar: ~のか分かんなかった - casual 'didn't know/understand ~' (分からなかった); ~ってこと? - 'you mean...?' confirmation pattern; まだ~ていない - 'haven't yet ~'

text: 向こうの大学じゃ習ってなかったし / 大学? / ああ、去年卒業したの / え?こっちのこれはなんて書いてあんの?
translation: They didn't teach that at university back there. / University? / Yeah, I graduated last year. / Huh? What does this one say?
grammar: ~じゃ習ってなかった - 'wasn't taught at ~' (じゃ = では); ~したの - explanatory/confirmation の; ~って書いてある - 'it says/is written ~'

text: 熱膨張に関する問題だよ / 熱膨張?幼稚なことやってんのね
translation: It's a problem about thermal expansion. / Thermal expansion? You're studying such childish things.
grammar: ~に関する - 'relating to ~'; ~やってんのね - casual form of やっているのね 'doing ~, huh'

text: ドドのつまり物っての温めれば膨らんで大きくなるし / 冷やせば縮んで小さくなるってことじゃない / そりゃそうだけど
translation: Basically, if you heat things up they expand and get bigger, / and if you cool them down they contract and get smaller, right? / Well, yeah, but...
grammar: どどのつまり - 'in the end, basically'; ~ば - conditional 'if'; ~って - quotation marker; ~ってことじゃない - 'isn't it the case that...?'

text: 私の場合胸だけ温めれば少しはおっぱいが大きくなるのかな
translation: In my case, I wonder if heating just my chest would make my breasts get a little bigger?
grammar: ~の場合 - 'in the case of ~'; ~ば - conditional 'if'; ~のかな - 'I wonder if ~' (uncertain/wondering tone)

text: そんなこと聞かれたってわかんないよ / つまんない男 / ここ?
translation: I don't know even if you ask me something like that! / You're such a boring guy. / Here?
grammar: ~たって - 'even if ~'; わかんない - casual form of わからない 'don't know'

text: 見て見て!シンジ! / ん? / バックロールエントリー!
translation: Look, look! Shinji! / Hm? / Back roll entry!
grammar: 見て見て - repetition for emphasis 'look, look!'; バックロールエントリー - English loanword for scuba diving technique

text: これではよくわからんな / しかし浅間山地震研究所の報告通り / この影は気になります / もちろん無視はできん / マギの判断は? / フィフティーフィフティーです
translation: I can't really tell from this. / However, just as the Asama Earthquake Research Institute reported, / this shadow concerns me. / Of course we can't ignore it. / What's MAGI's judgment? / Fifty-fifty.
grammar: よくわからん - casual/masculine negative form of よくわからない; ~通り - 'just as ~, according to ~'; 気になる - 'to be bothered/concerned about'

text: 現地へは? / すでに、葛城一位が到着しています
translation: What about on site? / Captain Katsuragi has already arrived.
grammar: すでに - 'already'; ~ています - continuous/completed state

text: もう限界です / いえ、あと500をお願いします
translation: We're at the limit already. / No, please go another 500.
grammar: もう - 'already'; あと~ - 'another ~, ~ more'

text: 震度1200、耐圧隔壁に亀裂発生 / 葛城さん!
translation: Depth 1200, crack forming in pressure bulkhead! / Katsuragi-san!
grammar: ~に - location particle 'in/at ~'; 発生 - noun used as verb with する

text: 壊れたら、うちで弁償します。あと200
translation: If it breaks, we'll compensate you. 200 more.
grammar: ~たら - conditional 'if ~'; うちで - 'on our part, we will'

text: ソニターに反応!
translation: Response on sonar!
grammar: ~に反応 - 'response/reaction on ~'

text: 解析開始! / はい!
translation: Begin analysis! / Yes!
grammar: Noun + する verb used in command form without する (解析開始 instead of 解析を開始する)

text: 観測機悪回!爆発しました!
translation: Observation equipment failure! It exploded!
grammar: ~しました - polite past tense

text: 解析は? / ギリギリで間に合いましたね。パターン青です。
translation: The analysis? / We just barely made it. It's pattern blue.

vocabulary.meaning: to be in time, to make it

grammar: ~で間に合う - 'made it with/by ~'; ~ね - confirmation/agreement particle

text: 間違いない。使徒だわ。 / これより、当研究所は完全閉鎖! / NERVの管轄下となります。
translation: No mistake. It's an Angel. / From this point, this research institute is completely sealed! / It will come under NERV's jurisdiction.
grammar: 間違いない - 'no mistake, certain'; ~だわ - feminine assertion; これより - 'from now, from this point'; ~となる - 'to become ~'

text: 一切の入室を禁じた上、過去6時間以内の事象は全て無害費とします。
translation: All entry is forbidden, and furthermore, all events within the past 6 hours will be classified.
grammar: ~た上 - 'after doing ~, furthermore'; ~以内 - 'within ~'; ~とする - 'to decide/declare as ~'

text: 怒り司令宛にA17を要請して、大支給。 / 気 / をつけてください。これは通常回線です。 / わか / っているわ。さっさと手比回線に切り替えて。
translation: Request A-17 to Commander Ikari, highest priority. / Be / careful. This is a normal line. / I / know that. Hurry and switch to a secure line.
grammar: ~宛に - 'addressed to ~'; 気をつける - 'be careful'; さっさと - 'hurry up, quickly'

text: 17?こちらから撃っててるのか?そうです。 / ダメだ、 / 危険すぎる。15年前を忘れたとは言わせんぞ。
translation: A-17? You're attacking from our side? That's right. / No good. / Too dangerous. I won't let you say you've forgotten what happened 15 years ago.
grammar: ~すぎる - 'too ~'; ~たとは言わせない - 'won't let you say that ~'; ~んぞ - emphatic masculine prohibition

text: これはチャンスなのです。これまで防戦一方だった我々が初めて攻勢に出るため。 / リスクが大きすぎるな。
translation: This is our chance. For us, who have only been on the defensive until now, to go on the offensive for the first time. / The risk is too great.
grammar: これまで - 'until now'; ~一方 - 'only ~, one-sided'; ~に出る - 'to go into/take ~'; ~ため - 'in order to ~'

text: しかし、生きた使徒のサンプル、その重要性はすでに生じのことでしょう。 / 失敗は許さん。
translation: However, a living Angel sample - you already understand its importance. / I will not permit failure.
grammar: ~のこと - 'matter of ~'; ~でしょう - 'probably, I assume'; 許さん - masculine negative 'will not permit'

text: 失敗か。その時は人類そのものが消えてしまうよ。本当にいいんだな。
translation: Failure? At that point, humanity itself will disappear. Are you really sure this is okay?
grammar: その時は - 'at that time, in that case'; ~てしまう - completion/regrettable result; ~んだな - confirmation 'right?, isn't it?'

text: これが使徒? / そうよ。まだ完成体になっていないさなぎの状態みたいなものね。
translation: This is the Angel? / That's right. It's like it's still in a chrysalis state, not yet a complete form.
grammar: ~になっていない - 'hasn't become ~'; ~みたいなもの - 'something like ~, kind of like ~'

text: 今回の作戦は使徒の捕獲を最優先とします。 / 出来うる限り原型をとどめ、生きたまま回収すること。 / できなかった時は?
translation: This operation prioritizes capturing the Angel above all else. / Preserve its original form as much as possible and recover it alive. / What if we can't?
grammar: ~を~とする - 'to make ~ as ~'; 出来うる限り - 'as much as possible'; ~たまま - 'while still ~, remaining ~'; ~こと - nominalizer for instructions

text: 即時殲滅。いいわね。 / はい! / 作戦担当者は? / はいはい! / 私が潜る!
translation: Immediate annihilation. Got it? / Yes! / Who's the operation officer? / Me, me! / I'll dive!
grammar: いいわね - feminine confirmation 'okay?, got it?'; はいはい - emphatic/eager response

text: でも、また僕なんだろうな。 / アスカ。
translation: But it'll be me again, won't it? / Asuka.
grammar: ~なんだろうな - 'I suppose it's ~, isn't it?' (resigned/expectant tone)

text: 2号機で担当して。 / はーい!こんなの楽勝じゃん! / 私は… / プロトタイプの05機には特殊装備は規格外なのよ
translation: You'll take Unit-02. / Yay! This is a piece of cake! / What about me...? / The special equipment is incompatible with the prototype Unit-00.
grammar: ~で担当する - 'to be in charge with ~'; こんなの - 'something like this'; ~じゃん - casual assertion 'isn't it, right?'

text: レイト05機は本部での待機を命じます / はい / 残念だったわね! / 温泉行けなくって
translation: Rei, I order Unit-00 to stand by at headquarters. / Yes. / Too bad for you! / That you can't go to the hot spring.
grammar: ~での待機 - 'standby at ~'; ~を命じる - 'to order ~'; ~だったわね - feminine past tense with confirmation; ~行けなくって - 'can't go' (て-form used conversationally)

text: A17が発令された以上、すぐに出るわよ / 支度して / はい!
translation: Now that A-17 has been issued, we're leaving immediately. / Get ready. / Yes!
grammar: ~された以上 - 'now that ~ has been done'; すぐに - 'immediately'; 支度して - command form of 支度する

text: 耐熱仕様のプラグスーツといっても、いつものと変わらないじゃない / 右のスイッチを押してみて
translation: Even though they say it's a heat-resistant plug suit, it doesn't look any different from usual. / Try pushing the switch on the right.
grammar: ~といっても - 'even though they say ~, although ~'; ~と変わらない - 'no different from ~'; ~てみて - 'try doing ~'

text: うわー、いやー! / なによこれー!
translation: Uwaa, no! / What is this?!
grammar: なによこれ - casual/emotional 'what is this?!'

text: 2号機の支度もできてるわ / いやー!な / によー、これー!
translation: Unit-02 is ready too. / No! Wha / t is this?!
grammar: ~もできている - 'is also ready/done'; elongated vowels (いやー、なによー) show emotional distress

text: 耐熱、耐圧、耐核防護服 / 極地戦用のD型装備よ
translation: Heat-resistant, pressure-resistant, nuclear-resistant protective suit. / It's Type-D equipment for polar region combat.
grammar: 連用形 listing (耐熱、耐圧、耐核) - multiple adjectives in sequence; ~用の - 'for the purpose of ~'

text: これがあたしの、2号機?
translation: This is my... Unit-02?
grammar: Pause before final word shows hesitation/disbelief

text: いやだ!あたし降りる! / こんなので人前に出たくないわ
translation: No way! I'm getting out! / I don't want to appear in front of people looking like this!

vocabulary.meaning: in front of people, in public

grammar: いやだ - emphatic refusal 'no way!'; こんなので - 'looking like this, in this state'; ~たくない - 'don't want to ~'

text: こういうのはシンジの方がお似合いよ / そいつは残念だな
translation: This kind of thing suits Shinji better. / That's too bad.
grammar: ~の方が - 'more than ~, ~ is better'; お似合い - honorific form of 似合う; そいつは - casual 'that'

text: アスカの勇姿が見れると思ってたんだけどな
translation: I was thinking I'd get to see Asuka's gallant figure though.
grammar: 見れる - potential form 'can see' (colloquial for 見られる); ~と思ってた - 'was thinking that ~'; ~んだけどな - regretful/disappointed tone

text: でもこんなダサいの来て / カジさんの前に出る勇気なんてないわ / 困りましたね / そうね
translation: But wearing something this uncool, / I don't have the courage to appear in front of Kaji-san. / This is a problem. / Indeed.
grammar: ~来て - te-form of 着る 'to wear'; ~なんてない - 'don't have something like ~'; 困りましたね - polite past tense expressing problem

text: あの僕が / 私が2号機で出るわ
translation: Um, I'll... / I'll go out in Unit-02.
grammar: あの - hesitation marker 'um, uh'; ~で出る - 'to go out in/with ~'

text: あなたには私の2号機に触ってほしくないの / 悪いけど、ファーストが出るくらいなら私が行くわ
translation: I don't want you touching my Unit-02. / Sorry, but if it's between the First going out, I'll go myself.
grammar: ~てほしくない - 'don't want (someone) to ~'; ~の - explanatory particle; ~くらいなら - 'if it comes to ~, rather than ~'

text: カッコ悪いけど、我慢してね
translation: It's uncool, but bear with it, okay?
grammar: ~けど - 'but'; 我慢してね - 'please endure/bear with it' (ね adds softness)
